videos.title: Language Families | That's a Fact
videos.description: Genesis 10 documents about 70 different language families in its Table of Nations. About how many language families are there today? How does science confirm the number?

videos.title: Throwing a Strike | That's a Fact
videos.description: Great pitchers make throwing a ball look easy, but there’s a lot more to it than you might think. How does God’s design allow us to throw even one pitch for a strike?

videos.title: Seven-Day Week | That's a Fact
videos.description: There aren’t any astronomical reasons why a week has seven days. Or why we traditionally work for six of those days and rest on the seventh. Why is a week seven days long?

videos.title: Our Young Universe | That's a Fact
videos.description: Everywhere we look in the universe, we see that the evidence is consistent with what the Bible says about its age. Just how old is the universe?

videos.title: Extraterrestrial Life | That's a Fact
videos.description: The question of whether there’s life on other planets is a hot topic in sci-fi movies and TV shows, but secular scientists really do believe they’ll find life beyond Earth. Is Earth just another planet, or is there something special about it?

videos.title: Dinosaurs on Noah's Ark | That's a Fact
videos.description: The Bible says that two of every animal kind were on the Ark with Noah. So, were dinosaurs on Noah’s Ark? What did they eat? How did they all fit?

videos.title: Turkey Coma? | That's a Fact
videos.description: How did turkey become the main course for most Thanksgiving feasts? Is the tryptophan in turkey to blame for the annual “turkey coma”? Whether or not this bird is on the menu for your family this holiday season, we have a lot to thank God for.

videos.title: Flying Machine | That's a Fact
videos.description: Leonardo da Vinci dreamed up a flying machine over 500 years ago, but it wasn’t until 1903 that the famous Wright brothers designed and successfully flew the first powered heavier-than-air aircraft. Since their inspiration came from studying the mechanics of pigeon wings in flight, the invention of airplanes is an awesome example of biomimicry—humans copying God’s design.

videos.title: Man's Best Friend | That's a Fact
videos.description: As the old saying goes, dogs are man’s best friend. Dogs perform many useful tasks—from hunting to security to helping people with disabilities. Most of us would agree that we’re just glad they’re part of the family! Where did dogs come from? How can we explain the tremendous variety of dog breeds?

videos.title: The Secret Code | That's a Fact
videos.description: Can evolution explain math? The Mandelbrot set of numbers reveals a secret code that went undiscovered for thousands of years. While mathematicians can plot this set by hand, today’s computers show with great precision the beauty God built into numbers.

videos.title: Louis Pasteur | That's a Fact
videos.description: In the 19th century, the theory of abiogenesis was widely accepted, much like evolution is today. Charles Darwin strongly promoted the idea that life was generated spontaneously from non-life. However, Louis Pasteur, a French microbiologist and believer in biblical creation, made a startling discovery that turned this notion completely upside down.

videos.title: Useful and Versatile Hands | That's a Fact
videos.description: Mankind has made a lot of tools, but none of them rival the usefulness and versatility of the human hand. Its structure and design give evidence of God’s creativity and allows us to do a wide variety of tasks—like typing, eating, and building skyscrapers.

videos.title: The Ice Age | That's a Fact
videos.description: Ice sheets, saber-toothed tigers, and wooly mammoths—the Ice Age sounds like a cool time! But what caused it? And was there more than one Ice Age?

videos.title: Echolocation | That's a Fact
videos.description: While bats live in air and dolphins live in water, both use a biological form of sonar technology called echolocation to see with sound! The specifications in dolphin and bat biosonar systems are so many, so well-integrated, and so precise, could they really have developed at random in two completely different environments?

videos.title: Dinosaurs and Humans | That's a Fact
videos.description: Did humans and dinosaurs co-exist? Are dinosaurs in the Bible? See what lab tests show about the actual age of dinosaur bones.

videos.title: Fibonacci Numbers | That's a Fact
videos.description: Throughout history, intelligent scholars have explored the complex mysteries of numbers. One such intellectual was Leonardo of Pisa—also known as Fibonacci. What do Fibonacci numbers reveal about our Creator?

videos.title: Chimp DNA | That's a Fact
videos.description: Secular scientists claimed in the 1970s that chimp genomes are 98% similar to humans, and it was apparently verified by more modern techniques. But that estimate actually used isolated segments of DNA that we already share with chimps—not the whole genomes. The latest comparison that included all of the two species’ DNA revealed a huge difference from the percentage scientists have been claiming for years.

videos.title: Dino Tracks | That's a Fact
videos.description: Dinosaur tracks can be found on every continent! But just how did they form?

videos.title: Carbon 14 Dating | That's a Fact
videos.description: Each year, it’s fun to celebrate birthdays. If we’re not sure of someone’s age, we can always check their birth certificate. But can any reliable methods determine the age of an object without a historical record?

videos.title: Cambrian Explosion | That's a Fact
videos.description: Cambrian rock layers contain nearly all the basic animal forms—with no trace of transitional fossils in lower Precambrian rocks. Even Darwin himself had a difficult time explaining what we now call the “Cambrian explosion” of life.

videos.title: Chinese Pictographs | That's a Fact
videos.description: Ancient Chinese pictographs have been around for thousands of years. Clues in the picture symbols show that the earliest Chinese words must have included basic historical facts from Genesis when the symbols were invented.

videos.title: Fearfully and Wonderfully Made | That's a Fact
videos.description: Perhaps no greater wonder exists than a human life growing within another human life. Mother and baby are deeply connected yet two very separate beings. God put many special features in place so that we could not only survive, but thrive!

videos.title: Cell Origins | That's a Fact
videos.description: The origin of the first cell is one of evolution’s biggest problems. Though the cell is the basic building block for life, its design is actually very complex. Its functions can be compared to those of computers, building projects—and even whole cities.

videos.title: Blue Stars | That's a Fact
videos.description: The three bright blue stars that make up Orion’s belt look pretty small up in the night sky. But actually blue stars are some of the most massive and brightest stars in the whole universe. How do so many short-lived stars exist in a universe that is supposedly 13.8 billion years old?

videos.title: The Seeing Eye | That's a Fact
videos.description: Great photographers pair a select lens to a sophisticated camera and then adjust shutter speed and aperture size to capture the perfect photo. Our eyes perform similar tasks but are precisely engineered better than any camera—and their components are vastly more sophisticated. Could the seeing eye have been made by time and chance?

videos.title: Big Bang? | That's a Fact
videos.description: How did the universe begin? Some people say that it came into existence billions of years ago in a massive explosion. But this Big Bang has some big problems.

videos.title: Population Growth | That's a Fact
videos.description: In 2011, the world’s human population reached seven billion. How long did it take for this many humans to be born?

videos.title: Global Flood | That's a Fact
videos.description: The book of Genesis describes a catastrophic worldwide Flood. Is there any evidence that floodwaters covered the entire Earth?

videos.title: Creation Days | That's a Fact
videos.description: Genesis says that God created the universe in six days. But some people question what the word “day” means! What is a creation day?

videos.title: Climate Change | That's a Fact
videos.description: Climate change heats up the headlines. But is the earth really getting warmer?

videos.title: Whale Evolution | That's a Fact
videos.description: In 1859, Darwin speculated that bears evolved into whales. But does this story hold water?

videos.title: "Junk" DNA | That's a Fact
videos.description: Darwinists assume creatures evolved through random mutations. This leads to another assumption that human DNA must be full of useless sequences. They call it “junk” DNA.

videos.title: Humans are Unique | That's a Fact
videos.description: Humans are unique, and we’re the only creatures on earth that celebrate holidays, such as Thanksgiving. And since the Bible says that God made us in His image, we have many, many reasons to be thankful.

videos.title: Imitating Humans | That's a Fact
videos.description: We use computers so much that it’s easy to forget that they’ve only been around for about 70 years. But the most brilliantly engineered machines cannot even come close to the complexity and construction of the human brain.

videos.title: Isaac Newton | That's a Fact
videos.description: Some of us think of Isaac Newton as the guy who discovered how gravity works…you know, like the apple falling from the tree. But Newton did much more than just that. He was a brilliant mathematician and physicist, and many today recognize him as one of the greatest scientists of all time.

videos.title: Evolution in Action | That's a Fact
videos.description: It’s easy to see that puppies grow to become dogs, and that kittens become cats. But what about animals that look very different when they’re babies, like tadpoles?

videos.title: Useless Body Parts | That's a Fact
videos.description: Body parts like tonsils and the appendix were once considered unnecessary organs left over from evolution. But scientists have discovered that these “unnecessary” organs are actually very useful.

videos.title: About the Institute for Creation Research
videos.description:
At the Institute for Creation Research, we want you to know God’s Word can be trusted with everything it speaks about—from how and why we were made, to how the universe was formed, to how we can know God and receive all He has planned for us.

That’s why ICR scientists have spent more than 50 years researching scientific evidence that refutes evolutionary philosophy and confirms the Bible’s account of a recent and special creation. We regularly receive testimonies from around the world about how ICR’s cutting-edge work has impacted thousands of people with God’s creation truth.

Learn more: https://www.icr.org/

videos.title: Evolving Bacteria | That's a Fact
videos.description: With all the bad bacteria out there, scientists are working hard to develop new antibiotics to combat them. But these microbes often mutate when they reproduce, making some of them resistant to medicine. Is this process “evolution in action”?

videos.title: Looking Young | That's a Fact
videos.description: No one’s ever discovered the “fountain of youth” but a lot of us still try to keep up a youthful appearance. Scientists also tell us about the age of this planet we call home. But not everyone’s in agreement.

videos.title: Beetle Battle | That's a Fact
videos.description: We’ve all seen pictures of animals doing battle or predators stalking their unsuspecting prey. But the Bombardier beetle is equipped with what scientists have described as a chemical cannon.

videos.title: Land Ho | That's a Fact
videos.description: Despite the no-frills travel these days, millions continue to fly each year.. on business, on vacation, and for the holidays. But few travel over seven thousand miles in just nine days – and no airplane can do it without stopping.

videos.title: Ant Engineer | That's a Fact
videos.description: Ants can ruin picnics and cause all kinds of trouble. But these little creatures have amazing attributes that scientists are now learning from.

videos.title: Goldilocks Planet | That's a Fact
videos.description: Scientists have been searching for the Goldilocks planet for years. Like the fairy tale, it’s about finding a planet that’s “just right” for life. But earth is the only planet that’s able to support life, as created by a loving God.

videos.title: Back Trouble | That's a Fact
videos.description: Ever have back troubles? Evolutionists would have you think that the root of back pain comes from evolutionary ancestors. But the fact of the matter is, two legs or four, we all get back troubles.

videos.title: Intelligent Surveys | That's a Fact
videos.description: You would think after 200 years, the theory of evolution would have convinced more people. How many people today actually believe the theory of evolution?

videos.title: Muscle Man | That's a Fact
videos.description: Bodybuilders are known for having the best muscles. It’s no easy feat, because the structure of our muscles is complicated and the biological processes are sophisticated in both man and animals.

videos.title: Three in One | That's a Fact
videos.description: For centuries philosophers and theologians have tried to explain the Trinity. Some have tried but our attempts often fall short. However, God in His wisdom provided an example in creation that is a parallel to His own Triune existence—the universe.

videos.title: Missing in Action | That's a Fact
videos.description: The missing link… Commonly thought of as a hypothetical ape-like creature. This evolutionary rock star is supposed to bridge the gap between man and ape. But there are missing links all over Darwin’s evolutionary tree. And guess what… they are still missing.

videos.title: Jurassic Omelette | That's a Fact
videos.description: Which came first? The chicken or the egg? And what about dinosaur eggs?

videos.title: Biblical Giants | That's a Fact
videos.description: You may know the story of how David fought Goliath, a giant man armed with a sword. Just how big were Goliath and other giants of the Bible? How can this be explained today?

videos.title: Ice Cores | That's a Fact
videos.description: Secular scientists often say that thick ice sheets, like those in Greenland, took hundreds of thousands of years to form. They say each layer represents one year. So all you do is count the layers to get the age, right? Wrong! It's not that simple.

videos.title: The Fossil Record | That's a Fact
videos.description: Do fossils really show that creatures gradually evolved from simple to complex? The late fossil expert and evolution defender Stephen Jay Gould recognized they didn't. He said the fossil record shows two clear features: 1) sudden appearance and 2) stasis.

videos.title: Origins: Re-examining the Evidence
videos.description: Media, movies, and nature programs overwhelmingly emphasize the idea that humans evolved from primate ancestors. But what does the scientific evidence really show? There are no “almost human” ancestors, only humans and apes—two separate kinds—just as God created them around 6,000 years ago. icr.org/origins

videos.title: Is Radioisotope Dating Reliable and Scientific?
videos.description: Dr. Brian Thomas goes behind the scenes at the ICR Discovery Center Mount St. Helens exhibit to uncover the truth about radioisotope dating methods. Discover why radioisotope dating isn't sound science and how lab results impacted biblical and geological history.

videos.title: Dinosaur Fossils 101
videos.description: Frank Sherwin goes behind the scenes in the ICR Discovery Center atrium to uncover the science and history of dinosaur fossils. What did dinosaurs eat? What function did plates fulfill for Stegosaurus? Did dinosaurs evolve into birds? What is the difference between dinosaur scales and bird feathers? Get answers to these questions and more!

videos.title: The Catastrophic Geology of Mount St. Helens
videos.description:
Remembering Mount St. Helens: 40 Years Later | ICR geologist Dr. Tim Clarey shares geological lessons from Mount St. Helens.

In 1980, Mount St. Helens dropped an outdoor laboratory in geologists’ laps, forcing them to accept catastrophic events as major contributors to Earth’s overall geologic story. Since the initial eruptions, Mount St. Helens has provided further empirical data that support catastrophism and refute strict uniformitarianism. Creation geologists continue to use Mount St. Helens as a living example of the devastating effects of geological events like the global Flood. Mount St. Helens truly is a lasting monument to catastrophe.​

videos.title: The Rapid Biological Recovery of Mount St. Helens
videos.description:
Remembering Mount St. Helens: 40 Years Later | ICR zoologist Mr. Frank Sherwin shares biological and ecological lessons from Mount St. Helens.

After a natural disaster, creation scientists observe geological and environmental recovery processes, and apply those observations to better understand the disastrous effects of the global Flood. The 1980s eruptions of Mount St. Helens have impacted many areas of science, including geology and ecology. Recovery by flora and fauna in the devastated area around the volcano occurred very quickly. These observations have profound implications for understanding how Earth’s ecology would have been renewed after the global Flood recorded in Genesis.​

videos.title: How Long Were the Days of Creation in Genesis?
videos.description: Dr. Brian Thomas goes behind the scenes in the ICR Discovery Center atrium to tell you about the six days of creation, how science confirms Genesis history, and how we can know the length of each creation day.

videos.title: What Can We Know About the Garden of Eden, Dinosaurs, and Giraffes?
videos.description: Frank Sherwin goes behind the scenes in the ICR Discovery Center Garden in Eden exhibit to talk about Genesis history, dinosaurs and man, and God's amazing design of giraffes.

videos.title: OVER 50 YEARS of Science Research - You Can Believe the Bible!
videos.description:
At the Institute for Creation Research, we want you to know God’s Word can be trusted with everything it speaks about—from how and why we were made, to how the universe was formed, to how we can know God and receive all He has planned for us.

That’s why ICR scientists have spent more than 50 years researching scientific evidence that refutes evolutionary philosophy and confirms the Bible’s account of a recent and special creation. We regularly receive testimonies from around the world about how ICR’s cutting-edge work has impacted thousands of people with God’s creation truth.

---

“ICR’s most pressing assignment is to fundamentally change the way people understand biology. Our task is to construct a completely new theory of biological design that incorporates recent discoveries and respects the biblical narrative. The theory would explain hundreds of fascinating examples of creatures’ abilities from an organism-centered, engineering-based perspective that gives glory to their Creator— and not to nature.

“We hope this theory will become the fundamental, design-based principle uniting biological explanations in Christian textbooks and museums educating future generations of young believers. We pray that an engineering-based approach to biology will spark a second creationist revival…and once again stir up a sense of certainty in Christian truth.”

— ICR President Dr. Randy Guliuzza

---

How Can ICR Help You?

videos.title: Do Complex Systems Defy Evolution? | The Creation Podcast: Episode 34
videos.description:
Which came first, the protein or the cell? They were intentionally created at the same time along with every essential component of the all-or-nothing systems of life on earth. However, the theory of evolution claims that all forms of life arose by chance over long periods of time – is that possible?

Join host Trey Bowling and ICR paleobiochemist Dr. Brian Thomas as they define irreducible complexity, describe systems that qualify as all-or-nothing, and discuss how these biological necessities prove to be incompatible with evolutionary theory.

Related resource: Creation Basics & Beyond, 2nd Ed. | Get the book here: https://store.icr.org/creation-basics-beyond-2nd.html

videos.title: How Old Is The Universe? | The Creation Podcast: Episode 35
videos.description:
Many scientists claim that the universe is approximately 13.8 billion years old by reverse-engineering the Big Bang with the assumption that this theory is correct. How then do they explain the signs of youth in the earth, our solar system, and deep space? 

In this episode, host Ivana Semidey and ICR physicist Dr. Jake Hebert take a look at how phenomena like the earth's magnetic field, comets, distant starlight, spiral galaxies, and globular clusters provide evidence for a universe that is closer to 6,000 years old. 

Related resource: Guide to the Universe | Get the book here: https://store.icr.org/guide-to-the-universe.html

videos.title: The Importance of Biblical Creation Seminar | Chas Morse | November 5, 2022
videos.description:
Join us as the ICR Discovery Center hosts The Importance of Biblical Creation Seminar on Saturday, November 5! ICR Director of Donor Relations Chas Morse will answer seven questions about Genesis, biblical creation, and implications for your faith. Share this live stream with your family and friends for a faith-building, edifying creation event. 

---

Preaching and teaching the biblical narrative of six-day creation and the worldwide Flood as real history is an essential doctrine of Scripture with practical present-day implications for believers in Christ.

The four primary educational goals for this series of lectures are as follows:

• An increased confidence in the clarity and accuracy of God’s Word especially as it pertains to Biblical Creation
• Discover the importance of embracing a Biblical Creation worldview as it relates to the entirety of Scripture
• Demonstrate how a true understanding of current scientific research affirms a historical and correct interpretation of Scripture
• Acknowledge the implications for believers so that they will embrace living Biblically in this present age (Foundational text: 2 Peter 3:1-18)

---

Introduction: Does Genesis Matter?
In this introductory session, Mr. Morse gives an overview of the importance of believing in a literal six-day creation and worldwide Flood as conveyed in Genesis. He defines biblical creation and then begins to explain how rejecting the creation account leads to other problems in properly understanding God’s written Word.

What Does the Bible Say About Biblical Creation?
The Bible clearly tells us how God created the universe and this is clearly taught throughout the pages of Scripture. Mr. Morse underscores the Bible's insistence that the world was made in 6 literal days and that the world was engulfed by a worldwide Flood—a theme emphasized both in the Old and New Testaments.

What Does Theology Say About Biblical Creation?
Believing in Biblical Creation is foundational in the gospel message and in other theological themes presented in Scripture. Mr. Morse unfolds several of these themes in this brief session.

How Does History Weigh Creation’s Importance?
Mr. Morse will briefly discuss how the how church viewed creation and the Genesis Flood before, during, and after the Reformation? Also, we will see how the Reformation’s focus on the clarity of Scripture shifted the church back to viewing creation and Flood as historical events.

How Is Creation Viewed in the Church Today?
Why are many pastors and Christian leaders today deferring to ideologies like evolution and natural selection rather than believing in the historical events of Genesis? Mr. Morse will discuss several reasons why we have seen this compromising shift.

Does Good Science Have Any Relationship to the Biblical Narrative?
Are there conflicts between science and the Bible? Is there a relationship between what science is observing in creation and what’s recorded in Scripture? Mr. Morse will show how true scientific discoveries affirm the works of God as they are recorded in Scripture.

What Are the Creation Implications for a Believer’s Sanctification?
Believing in a literal 6-day creation and a worldwide Flood makes a difference in one’s Christian growth as discussed in 2 Peter 3:1-18. Mr. Morse will be discussing our understanding of a Biblical Creationist worldview and its place in a believer’s sanctification.

videos.title: Creation Class: Adam or Apes | DVD Trailer
videos.description:
Ever since Darwin proposed his theory of evolution by means of natural selection, scientists have been eager to find proof. The hunt for clues to human evolution takes center stage.

Fossil specimens are frequently presented to the public as undeniable confirmation that modern man developed from an ape-like ancestor. Are these claims valid? Is the evidence so ironclad that no one can dispute it? Join ICR paleobiochemist Dr. Brian Thomas as he unravels some of the biases inherent in the scientific community and dismantles the claims regarding several alleged "missing links."

Can science and faith be reconciled? What should we believe about the Bible's account of human origins and Earth history? ICR's Creation Class series affirms the accuracy and reliability of Scripture. Join ICR experts as they teach how science—from genetics to geology—confirms the truth of God's Word.

videos.description:
Carbon dating is a common method used to determine the ages of fossils and other materials, but carbon14 deteriorates quite quickly. How can it still be detected in things that are supposedly millions or billions of years old?

With the expertise of ICR geologist Dr. Tim Clarey, host Trey Bowling investigates different dating methods used by scientists to see if the data tells a different story than the one told in textbooks.

videos.description:
Join us LIVE on January 14, 2023, for the Made in His Image Seminar at the ICR Discovery Center in Dallas, Texas! The human body is an amazing feat of biological engineering, with myriad interconnecting systems that produce unique capabilities.

ICR’s Made in His Image Seminar examines the human body in all its wonder—created by God fully functional, fully human, and fully in His image. Each presentation reinforces the knowledge that every person is special to God, created with unique physical abilities, intellect, and spiritual life to fulfill His purpose.

---

• 10:15 AM | Dr. Brian Thomas | Adam, or Apes?

Polls show that illustrations of ape-like human ancestors convince more Americans of evolution than any other subject. Dr. Thomas shows how to place ape-man candidate fossils into three Genesis-friendly categories.

---

• 11:15 AM | Dr. Jeff Tomkins | Jesus Loves the Little Children: Explaining Red, Yellow, Black, and White

Where do all the people groups come from and are there really different human races? This talk debunks the evolutionary idea of human races started by Charles Darwin and shows how modern genetics and the Bible prove that human diversity connects directly to the Biblical accounts of the creation of man, the global flood, and the confusion of languages and dispersal at the Tower of Babel.

---

• 1:15 PM | Dr. Brian Thomas | Certainly Human: How Reproduction Reveals Creation

Details of human reproduction clearly show how mankind must have come from God, not primates. Middle school and older listeners will gain a new appreciation for the Creator’s genius and find new confidence that God alone designed marriage and human life.

videos.description: Watch the whole episode here: https://youtu.be/kz0GVdNu8Sg

videos.title: Darwin Dethroned Seminar (2023)
videos.description:
Join us LIVE on February 11, 2023, for the Darwin Dethroned Seminar at the ICR Discovery Center in Dallas, Texas!

Evolutionists mark the birth of Charles Darwin every February, as they venerate a man whose life’s work was pivotal in establishing naturalistic thinking as the predominant worldview in Western Civilization. Countless people have been influenced by the publication of his most notable work “The Origin of the Species,” and have accepted some form of Darwinian evolution as uncontested fact. But, how much has been discovered in the 160+ years since Darwin, that unravels his ideas and worldview, and unseats him as a legitimate authority on how creatures originate and adapt?

ICR’s Darwin Dethroned Seminar examines the claims of Darwin, and modern Darwinists, who argue that the diversity of life forms came about from random, purposeless processes, over millions of years, and that creatures have adapted to their environments by means of a mysterious force deemed Natural Selection.

Scripture and the scientific evidence are clear: the Lord Jesus Christ purposefully engineered all things by His Word, and pre-programmed creatures to interact with and fill their environments through a complex system of innate sensors, logic mechanisms, and output responses in a way that far exceeds anything Darwin could've ever imagined.

---

• 10:15 AM | Dr. Brian Thomas | The Beginning of Life

Using information you won’t find in secular biology textbooks, Dr. Thomas demonstrates the complete failure of natural processes to explain how life began. He critiques evolutionary speculations about the beginning of life and illustrates the engineered precision in cellular machines to show that God—not nature—created life.

---

• 11:15 AM | Dr. Tim Clarey | Geology and Deep Time

In this presentation, Dr. Clarey shows how sedimentary evidence across several continents confirms the occurrence of a global Flood. He presents oil industry data compiled into maps and diagrams that illustrate the progression of the Flood and match the biblical narrative. He provides biblically based scientific explanations for large-scale sedimentary deposits that were rapidly formed by catastrophic activity. This abundant evidence supports a worldwide Flood that happened just thousands of years ago.

---

• 1:15 PM | Dr. Randy Guliuzza | It’s Time to Do Biology as if Darwin Had Never Been Born 

This presentation will introduce you to a groundbreaking new model called continuous environmental tracking (CET) that explains how organisms adapt. It is the first fully organism-focused, design-based explanation of adaptation to be developed by any organization. Christians should know that the latest scientific research is fully on the side of a design-based explanation of adaptation…and evolutionists are trying to force-fit it into their theory. Some Intelligent Design advocates and creationists still see organisms as having been designed in part by a Designer and in part by nature, but there’s no scientific reason for this. CET brings clarity and eliminates the mysticism inherent in all selection-based notions. Properly identify the true cause of organisms’ dramatic capacity to self-adjust to different environments and you are on your way to the most powerful argument for a beneficent intelligent Designer consistent with the God of the Bible.

---

videos.title: Behold Now, BEHEMOTH!
videos.description:
The book of Job in the Old Testament mentions a rather unique creature that doesn't seem to fit any animal living today. While some commentators point to a hippo or a crocodile, others seem to think that this beast is intentionally mythological.

Host Trey and Dr. Brian Thomas discuss this fascinating creature and more on episode 51 of The Creation Podcast!

videos.description:
The Bible has been God’s Word to His people for millennia, but most people today question whether the events it records are actual history. Join us on Friday, November 10th, and Saturday, November 11th, as we explore the archaeological evidence for the historicity of the Bible!

The Biblical Archaeology Conference will feature renowned Biblical Scholar and Archaeologist, Dr. Randall Price of World of the Bible, and Prof. Tom Meyer, author of Archaeology and the Bible, and a graduate of Jerusalem University College.

videos.title: Unlocking the Mysteries of Genesis - Trailer
videos.description:
Unlocking the Mysteries of Genesis presents evidence that confirms the biblical account of creation and offers defensible answers to some of the most provocative and controversial questions of faith and science. How did life begin? Where did humans come from? Was Noah’s Flood real? How old is the earth?

In each dynamic 22-minute episode, host Markus Lloyd guides the viewer on a memorable journey through some of the most fascinating topics in creation science. Through interviews with the leading creation scientists, insights from cutting-edge research, and on-location investigations, Unlocking the Mysteries of Genesis presents evidence that supports a biblical viewpoint and dispels pervasive and inaccurate theories from the secular world.

Developed by the Institute for Creation Research, one of the world’s leading creation research organizations, this outstanding series provides an engaging exploration of creation science like never before. Together with the 112-page viewer guide, Unlocking the Mysteries of Genesis is an excellent resource for church, home, or academic study. Christians of all ages can find many of the answers they need to affirm and defend their faith and to discover the harmony between Scripture and science.

Purchase here: https://store.icr.org/unlocking-the-mysteries-of-genesis-dvd-series.html

Digital version available here: https://store.icr.org/unlocking-the-mysteries-of-genesis-dvd-series-down.html

videos.title: Made in His Image - Trailer
videos.description:
"So God created man in His own image; in the image of God He created him; male and female He created them." Genesis 1:27

Produced from a biblical perspective, Made in His Image will inspire audiences by looking at the human body in all its wonder—fully functional, fully human, and fully created in God's image. Featuring medical, engineering, and other experts like Dr. Randy Guliuzza, Made in His Image will fascinate audiences with mind-blowing facts, dazzling imagery, and memorable illustrations.

The four episodes will examine the stages of human development and show that everything we need to fulfill God's plan is instilled in us from the first moments of life. Each episode reinforces the knowledge that every human is special to God, and that he has endowed each of us with unique physical abilities, intellect, and spiritual lives to fulfill His purpose.

Purchase here: https://store.icr.org/made-in-his-image-dvd-series.html

videos.title: Uncovering the Truth About Dinosaurs - Trailer
videos.description:
Uncovering the Truth about Dinosaurs explores the most fascinating and mysterious creatures of all time - dinosaurs.

Fueled as much by popular culture as by science, dinosaurs capture the imagination. Footprints and fossilized bones prove they once existed, but many questions linger about what they were, where they came from, and how they lived and died. From the Institute for Creation Research, Uncovering the Truth about Dinosaurs takes on the challenge of unraveling these mysteries and unearthing the real truth.

Host Markus Lloyd (Unlocking the Mysteries of Genesis and Made in His Image) journeys to various locations to investigate some of the common theories about dinosaurs, while experts in subjects like paleontology, geology, archaeology, and history examine evidence that casts doubt on secular theories about geologic time and evolution.

Uncovering the Truth about Dinosaurs offers compelling evidence about these mysterious creatures that confirms the biblical account of Genesis. Witness the awesome work of the Creator and see how the Bible gets it right in all matters -- including dinosaurs.

Purchase here: https://store.icr.org/uncovering-the-truth-about-dinosaurs-dvd-series.html

Digital version available here: https://store.icr.org/uncovering-the-truth-about-dinosaurs-dvd-series-do.html

videos.title: The Universe: A Journey Through God's Grand Design - Trailer
videos.description:
Humans have always been intrigued by the celestial objects beyond our world and wondered: What are they? Where did they come from? And what do they say about where we come from?

The Universe: A Journey Through God’s Grand Design takes viewers on a journey through time and space, exploring how some of the greatest discoveries in astronomy were made by scientists of faith seeking to understand the exquisite order of God’s universe.

Host Markus Lloyd (Unlocking the Mysteries of Genesis, Made in His Image, and Uncovering the Truth about Dinosaurs) travels to world-class observatories and other locations, guiding viewers through the history of astronomy. From early theories of the solar system to Newton’s laws to the space race, every century yields profound discoveries and new mysteries to explore.

Each episode takes us deeper into space and closer to today, when interplanetary probes reveal astonishing evidence that confirms and leaves us in awe of God’s grace and power.

Purchase here: https://store.icr.org/the-universe-a-journey-through-gods-grand-design.html

The moon and the stars, which You have ordained,
What is man that You are mindful of him,
And the son of man that You visit him?
For You have made him a little lower than the angels,
And You have crowned him with glory and honor.

You have made him to have dominion over the works of Your hands;
You have put all things under his feet,
All sheep and oxen—
Even the beasts of the field,
The birds of the air,
And the fish of the sea
That pass through the paths of the seas.

O Lord, our Lord,
How excellent is Your name in all the earth!

Psalm 8:1-9

videos.title: Made in His Image Seminar (2024)
videos.description:
Join us LIVE on January 20, 2024, to celebrate the sanctity of human life during ICR's annual Made in His Image Seminar at the ICR Discovery Center. 

This event will feature ICR president Dr. Randy Guliuzza, who will be educating us on our innate value as human beings, and Dallas-based ministries that will show us how we can support the preservation of the sanctity of human life.

Note: Presentations may contain some sensitive subject matter.

* All livestream times are Central Standard Time.

---

• 10:35 AM | Dr. Randy Guliuzza (ICR) | The Image of God: Why It Matters

The “image of God” was brought into existence during the creation week and was uniquely infused into mankind. You will learn what the image of God is and why only human beings bear this precious gift. This image gives humans a special status in creation and has real day-to-day implications. It’s the most important factor in how people should treat each other and other creatures across the whole spectrum of life.


• 11:25 AM | Ms. Amy Ford (Embrace Grace) | Best Gift Ever

Ms. Ford, the founder of Embrace Grace, will be speaking about how this organization equips single and pregnant mothers in all 50 states and the world with Hope.


• 1:00 PM | Ms. Leanne Jamieson (Prestonwood Pregnancy Center) | Pregnancy Center Ministry in a Post-Roe World

Ms. Jamieson will talk about the ministry to abortion-determined women in a Post-Roe world. Abortion is illegal in the state of Texas, but we are far from it being unthinkable or unattainable. How are Believers called to action, and what does the changing landscape of ministry look like, given the victories had at the Supreme Court level? Ms. Jamieson will also discuss the abortion pill and abortion pill reversal and include powerful stories of life.


• 1:40 PM | Q&A Session

---

videos.title: Uncovering the Truth About Dinosaurs 1: Digging into Dinosaurs
videos.description:
The full series is available to members of the Champion of Creation tier!

Interviews with experts reveal intriguing information about favorite dinosaurs like T. rex and Triceratops, while host Markus Lloyd explores a fossil dig where paleontologists work to unravel the mysteries hidden in dinosaur bones.

Uncovering the Truth about Dinosaurs explores the most fascinating and mysterious creatures of all time—dinosaurs. We know they existed because we've discovered their footprints and fossilized bones. But the facts of their existence—and their extinction—remain shrouded in mystery. What were the dinosaurs? When and where did they live? How and when did they die? And why does it matter to Christians? The answers to these mysteries are buried in Earth's layers and revealed in the pages of the Bible. Studying evidence from paleontology, geology, biology, archaeology, and history, we'll get to the bottom of the story and unearth the real truth about dinosaurs.
