videos.title: Why One-Size-Fits-All Radiocarbon Dating Doesn’t Work
videos.description: Which is more trustworthy: carbon-14 dating or reliable eyewitnesses? Conventional dating methods aren’t as straightforward as they seem. In this episode, Dr. Jim Johnson investigates Viking bones, radiocarbon dating, and how we should determine the timeline of historical events. More... (https://www.icr.org/article/one-size-fits-all-radiocarbon-dating-doesnt-work/)

videos.title: Christians and Conservation
videos.description: Why should Christians care about conservation? What is the “dominion mandate”? And how can we best steward the resources God has given us? Zoologist and Research Associate Frank Sherwin describes the biblical and scientific reasons why Christians should take care of our planet. More... (https://www.icr.org/article/christians-conservation/)

videos.title: Common Design or Common Descent?
videos.description: Humans’ and chimpanzees’ many similar features are presented as one of the strongest evidences for evolutionary theory. But do these traits tell the story of evolution from an ape-like ancestor? What about the alternative view of design inference? Dr. Randy Guliuzza offers a clear-cut solution to the common design vs. common descent debate. More... (https://www.icr.org/article/common-design-common-descent/)

videos.title: Balancing Body Temperature
videos.description:
The 2018 Winter Olympics have arrived! Have you ever wondered how athletes can be out in the frigid temperatures and still sweat after finishing their events? Dr. Randy Guliuzza highlights the exquisite control mechanisms that balance body temperature even in such cold conditions. What a marvel!
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/body-temperature/)

videos.title: Beauty in Motion
videos.description:
We’re approaching the 2018 Winter Olympics. Are you looking forward to seeing great athletes go for the gold? When you watch snowboarders race down a hill—and they roll, twist, and spin—you’ll see evidence of the Creator’s clear design and engineering of the human body. Truly, athletes display beauty in motion.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/beauty-in-motion/)

videos.title: Do Billions of Years Fit with Genesis?
videos.description:
Many Christians think that if they can somehow find room in the Scriptures for billions of years then the conflict between Genesis and evolution will be solved. They might not admit it, but sometimes they desire an easy way out so they don’t have to investigate the sciences and Scriptures involved. Using his personal testimony as an example, Brian promises a fascinating and rewarding journey for those willing to examine the biblical and scientific evidence.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/do-billions-of-years-fit-with-genesis/)

videos.title: What About Radioisotope Clocks?
videos.description:
Secularists claim that radioisotope ages “objectively and scientifically” confirm millions of years. But ICR scientists have carefully examined their claims and found flaws and holes in their processes. What do radioisotope clocks actually reveal about the age of rocks and, ultimately, the earth?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/what-about-radioisotope-clocks/)

videos.title: Dating Dinosaur Fossils
videos.description:
Age bias continually colors the interpretation of dinosaur fossils. Can we truly know a fossil’s age? How do we know secular analyses are flawed? Is there evidence that confirms dinosaurs lived recently?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/dating-dinosaur-fossils/)

videos.title: Why Does Recent Creation Matter?
videos.description:
ICR scientists often talk about recent creation. But does the Bible really present this view? Should Christians discuss this issue with friends who think it doesn’t matter? Or should we leave the debate to philosophers, scientists, and theologians? Brian shares three reasons why recent creation really matters.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/why-does-recent-creation-matter/)

videos.title: Full-Bible Christian
videos.description:
The latest polls reveal a disturbing trend. Younger generations are less likely to believe that humans descended from the first man, Adam, only thousands of years ago. More people believe the evolutionary alternative of humans originating from an ape-like ancestor millions of years ago. How should Christians respond to this news? What must believers do to maintain a logically consistent approach to Genesis and the rest of Scripture?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/full-bible-christian/)

videos.title: Refuting a Favorite Old-Earth Argument
videos.description:
In 2010, the BioLogos Foundation published an article that proposed “biblical and scientific shortcomings of flood geology.” Discover the background of this paper’s research, ICR scientists’ response, and solid biblical and scientific counterarguments for recent creation and the global Flood.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/refuting-favorite-old-earth-argument/)

videos.title: How Consistent Are Old-Earth Clocks?
videos.description:
One argument often made for an old earth is the professed agreement of age assignments from various dating methods. Is this “case closed” for the age-of-the-earth debate? Dig deeper and uncover the contradictions in dating methods. Discover the reasons why millions and billions of years are not scientific.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/how-consistent-are-old-earth-clocks-podcast/)

videos.title: Genesis Compromise Unravels the Bible
videos.description:
Christians who accept the idea of millions of years might not be aware that they’re holding to a logically inconsistent position. How can we find clarity in the obvious tension between Genesis history and secular scientists’ claims? Should we accept Genesis 1-2 as written? Find out why our understanding of the beginning is foundational for faith in Jesus.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/genesis-compromise-unravels-bible-podcast/)

videos.title: Celebrating a Broken Climate "Pacemaker"
videos.description:
There is strong geological evidence for one ice age. Yet, secular scientists published an iconic technical paper that detailed multiple ice ages over long periods of time. Why did they miss the mark? How does science confirm the creationist position? And what major global event caused this frigid climate change?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/celebrating-broken-climate-pacemaker/)

videos.title: Dinosaur Extinction via Asteroid?
videos.description:
Have you heard about the Chicxulub impact site in Yucatan, Mexico? Some scientists claim this site as the “smoking gun” of the asteroid that wiped out the dinosaurs. Is this a smoking gun or just smoke? What results can we glean from empirical research?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/dinosaur-extinction-via-asteroid/)

videos.title: What Was Homo naledi?
videos.description:
Scientists recently reported the discovery of a new human-like species called Homo naledi. Why is this important to Christians? Dr. Clarey clears up the controversy surrounding the latest “missing link” claim.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/what-was-homo-naledi/)

videos.title: The Created Sun and Moon
videos.description:
What does Scripture say about the sun and the moon? How do these two “great lights” rule the heavens? Dr. Jim Johnson describes the sun and moon’s impact on our planet, as well as their effects on plants, animals, and humans. He also sheds light on a historical controversy involving Galileo.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/created-sun-and-moon/)

videos.title: Dinosaurs Are Not Birds
videos.description:
Birds and dinosaurs are completely different kinds. God uniquely created both of them only thousands of years ago. Learn how to debunk the secular propaganda of dinosaur-to-bird evolution.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/dinosaurs-are-not-birds/)

videos.title: Revealing the True Age of the Hawaiian Islands
videos.description:
Many textbooks teach that the Hawaiian Islands are millions of years old. How can we know their true age? Dr. Clarey digs out the truth from not-so-old Hawaiian rocks.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/true-age-hawaiian-islands/)

videos.title: How Theology Informs Science
videos.description:
Theology—formerly called “the queen of the sciences”—used to be held in high regard. However, skeptics like Lawrence Krauss continually make derogatory comments about theological topics. Why have many scientists discarded theology as irrelevant? Can we still find practical value in theology when conducting scientific research?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/how-theology-informs-science-podcast/)

videos.title: Discovering the Pre-Flood World
videos.description:
Can we know what the pre-Flood world looked like? How has Dr. Clarey’s cutting-edge megasequence research improved our understanding of the Genesis Flood? Uncover clues to Earth’s catastrophic past in this geological survey.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/discovering-pre-flood-world/)

videos.title: Solar Eclipse and the Created Sun
videos.description:
Solar eclipses are astonishing sights. These astronomical events—and even the sun itself—reveal a lot about creation and our Creator. When will the next solar eclipse occur? And how can we view it safely?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/solar-eclipse-created-sun/)

videos.title: From Big to Small, God Made It All
videos.description:
Our universe is unbelievably immense. Can you count the stars in the heavens or the grains of sand on the beach? Mr. Sherwin directs our eyes to the skies—and the submicroscopic world around us—to inspire wonder and worship of our awesome, majestic Creator.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/from-big-to-small-god-made-it-all/)

videos.title: Spiders
videos.description:
Do you feel a natural revulsion when you experience spiders up close? Why would God create creepy arachnids? Discover God’s purpose for these eight-legged arthropods.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/spiders/)

videos.title: Bombardier Beetle
videos.description:
Imagine a hungry frog chasing a delicious beetle. As the frog shoots out its sticky tongue to capture the prey, an explosion occurs that stuns the predator. Have you heard of this famous beetle? Learn about God’s remarkable design in the complex body of the bombardier beetle.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/bombardier-beetle/)

videos.title: DNA
videos.description:
What is DNA? Why is it important? And how does it reveal the handiwork of the omnipotent Designer? Discover the code of life as Mr. Sherwin unwinds the microscopic ladder of biological information our cells need to function and thrive.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/dna/)

videos.title: The Amazing Human Body
videos.description:
The psalmist said we are “fearfully and wonderfully made.” What insights can we glean from science to increase our wonder and honor our Creator? Mr. Sherwin highlights several features of human body systems that debunk evolutionary theory and glorify the Lord Jesus Christ.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/amazing-human-body/)

videos.title: The Scientific Method
videos.description:
We are constantly bombarded with fantastic claims about the past that are touted as scientific. The scientific method—a way to study the natural world—will help us better analyze these claims. Why should everyone know the scientific method? What role does the method play in studying historical events or unobserved speculations?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/the-scientific-method/)

videos.title: The Big Bang Is Broken
videos.description:
Secular cosmologists claim that the universe originated in an explosion 13.8 billion years ago. Some Christians believe this Big Bang is the means God used to create the universe. Is there evidence to support this? How should laypeople respond to the 3 main arguments for the Big Bang? Why should Christians reject the Big Bang?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/the-big-bang-is-broken/)

videos.title: Our Young Universe
videos.description:
According to the Big Bang origins model, our universe is said to be 13.8 billion years old. But a straightforward reading of the Bible—including historical information and the testimony of the Lord Jesus—confirms a young universe closer to 6,000 years old. How can Christians answer Big Bang claims? Dr. Hebert provides scientific and biblical reasons for a young universe.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/our-young-universe/)

videos.title: Does the 'God Particle' Prove the Big Bang?
videos.description:
Is the “God particle” truly “a blow to the Christian faith,” or “a nail in the coffin of religion”? Where does reality end and hype begin? Dr. Hebert exposes the flaws of the Big Bang theory and offers a logical evaluation of the scientific community.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/god-particle-big-bang/)

videos.title: Manganese Nodules and the Age of the Ocean
videos.description:
Many secular scientists extrapolate current seafloor sediment deposit rates. They then publish Earth age assignments of millions of years. Are they following the scientific method? How do manganese nodules present problems for old-Earth proponents? Does evidence line up with recent creation and the global Genesis Flood?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/manganese-nodules-age-of-ocean/)

videos.title: Saturn, Enceladus, and Blue Stars
videos.description:
Saturn is too hot for its evolutionary age. It should’ve cooled off if it were 4.5 billion years old. What can we learn about the age of the universe from our solar system? How can biblical creationists confidently assert a young age for celestial objects like blue stars?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/saturn-enceladus-blue-stars/)

videos.title: Where Did All the People Come From?
videos.description:
In 2011, the United Nations reported a world population of 7 billion. How long did it take for this many humans to be born? Evolutionists proclaim an ages-long history where the human population didn’t grow at all for millions of years but suddenly and recently exploded only thousands of years ago. Is this claim backed up by real science? How can we know for sure?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/where-did-all-the-people-come-from/)

videos.title: Mutation Rates Debunk Human Evolution Story
videos.description:
According to the evolutionary story, humans evolved from an unidentified ape-like ancestor over two million years ago. But this story doesn’t line up with the Bible or scientific evidence. What can we learn from our DNA to decipher the origins debate? How does genetics support the Christian worldview of a recent creation?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/mutation-rates-debunk-evolution/)

videos.title: Stretchy Dinosaur Soft Tissue
videos.description:
Scientists have been discovering original dinosaur proteins for decades. Upon cracking open the unearthed bones, scientists have found osteocytes, collagen, and other biological materials that give us clues about dinosaur skin color. How do these discoveries transform the way scientists view Earth history?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/stretchy-dinosaur-soft-tissue/)

videos.title: Rocks, Ice Cores, and Bill Nye
videos.description:
Why does Earth’s age matter? Are there better answers to the controversial methods of radioisotope dating? Is an ice core’s age simply determined by counting its layers? Brian Thomas explains why Christians need an educated response to the evolutionary stories of many geologists and media celebrities.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/rocks-ice-cores-bill-nye/)

videos.title: The Ultimate Proof of Creation
videos.description:
Who has time to memorize the overwhelming lines of evidence confirming creation? Isn’t there an easier way to communicate with a skeptic? Dr. Lisle presents one bulletproof argument that demonstrates the truth of creation.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/ultimate-proof-of-creation/)

videos.title: Science Confirms Biblical Creation
videos.description:
Ironically, many scientists attempt to disprove the Bible using disciplines like genetics and geology. But these fields continue to produce research that confirms the Bible. What steps should we take to promote biblical creation? What has science revealed?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/science-confirms-biblical-creation/)

videos.title: Jews and Greeks
videos.description:
1 Corinthians 1:23 states, “but we preach Christ crucified, to the Jews a stumbling block and to the Greeks foolishness.” This short passage gives us an important key to reaching our culture today with the gospel message. And it ties in very strongly to the creation-evolution debate.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/jews-and-greeks/)

videos.title: Faith vs. Science
videos.description:
The scientific world strives to exclude God from its thinking, and faith is not subject to the scientific method. So, how do we reconcile faith and science?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/faith-vs-science/)

videos.title: Genesis and Distant Starlight
videos.description:
Critics posit many questions about distant starlight and the Bible. Is there a problem with stars being billions of lightyears away? How does the Bible bring clarity to this issue? And how have scientific and mathematical discoveries affirmed the Genesis creation narrative?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/genesis-distant-starlight/)

videos.title: Design of the Solar System
videos.description:
The solar system is wonderfully designed for life—and for fascinating science, too! Both benefits reveal the richness of the Lord’s creativity. Discovering the truth the Lord has hidden for us to search out and find is the fun and thrill of science. What examples have we discovered in our own solar system?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/design-of-the-solar-system/)

videos.title: Hair, Feathers, and Scales
videos.description:
Creation scientists observe hair, feathers, and scales as unique structures revealing design. Evolutionary naturalists disagree, of course, maintaining a common origin for these skin appendages. Why does this issue matter? And how does this impact the study of origins and biological history?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/hair-feathers-scales/)

videos.title: The Moon
videos.description:
Our moon is unusually large, but it’s just the right size to aid life on Earth. As a masterpiece of design, it shouts God’s creation. How does lunar science support biblical truth?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/moon/)

videos.title: The Unique Earth and Unique Universe
videos.description:
How do scientific measurements and fundamental constants reflect the Creator’s divine hand? Our universe permits physical, interactive life only because these and many other numbers are exquisitely and independently balanced. How did such incredibly fine-tuned numbers come about: by chance and time, or by plan and purpose?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/unique-earth-universe/)

videos.title: Mount St. Helens Recovery
videos.description:
The Mount St. Helens events give us a glimpse into Earth’s geologic power, the origin of rocks, and the formation of geologic features. How does the ecological recovery of Mount St. Helens affirm the work of creation scientists? And what does this outdoor science lab teach us about the great Flood of Noah’s day?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/mount-st-helens-recovery/)

videos.title: Mount St. Helens: An Outdoor Laboratory
videos.description:
Geologist Dr. Steve Austin called the Mount St. Helens eruption “the geologic event of the twentieth century.” Mount St. Helens was not the largest volcano episode of the last century, but it became the most informative. What can the Mount St. Helens explosions, volcanic mud flows, and rapid ecological recovery tell us about the Genesis Flood?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/mount-st-helens-outdoor-lab/)

videos.title: Facts vs. Fantasy
videos.description:
Theories on the origin of the universe abound, but all seem to fit into one of two categories. Either you believe “in the beginning God created” or you must believe the Ph.D. who says he or she knows better. How can we separate fact from fantasy? Can anyone truly know how the universe began?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/facts-vs-fantasy/)

videos.title: Why Use Words?
videos.description:
Conservative Christians speak of inerrancy and inspiration, while liberal theologians prefer dynamic equivalence. But what does Jesus teach? How much authority do the Bible’s words really have?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/why-use-words/)

videos.title: Jots and Tittles
videos.description:
The Bible’s message requires absolute accuracy of every word of its written text. Jesus referenced the eternal nature of His Word. Even the letters themselves—the “jots” and “tittles”—are under God’s authority. What is the consistent message of Scripture? Can we be certain the Bible is without error?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/jots-and-tittles/)

videos.title: Oppositions of Science
videos.description:
The Apostle Paul warned Timothy about pseudoscience and “false knowledge.” Today, many twist the meaning of Scripture to promote their interpretation of scientific data. What is the root of this issue? And how should Christians handle apparent conflicts between the Bible and science?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/oppositions-of-science/)

videos.title: Ice Age and Seafloor Sediments
videos.description:
Seafloor sediments and dating methods may not seem like terribly exciting icebreaker topics. So, why does this field of research interest Dr. Hebert and the ICR science team? And how does it relate to our study of the Ice Age?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/ice-age-seafloor-sediments/)

videos.title: My Creation Journey
videos.description:
Dr. Hebert’s pursuit of creation research ministry started early in life. Learn about his early interest in science, middle school doubts about Christianity, and the book that changed the course of his personal and professional life.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/hebert-creation-journey/)

videos.title: Dissecting an Argument for the Big Bang
videos.description:
Secular scientists claim the universe came into existence through a cosmic explosion called the Big Bang. Some Christians try to argue that God used the Big Bang to create the universe. But what does the Bible say? And what are the scientific arguments?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/argument-big-bang/)

videos.title: Why the Age of the Earth Matters
videos.description:
Is the universe billions of years old—or only thousands?  Many Christians are uncomfortable with the idea of recent creation because they think science has “proven” otherwise. Is this a worthy battle? Can science prove the age of the universe?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/age-earth-matters/)

videos.title: A Universe from Nothing?
videos.description:
Many famous secular physicists claim we don’t need a Creator to explain the universe’s origin. They say “the laws of physics created the universe,” or, “the universe could have created itself.” Dr. Hebert offers four compelling reasons why this is not a scientific claim.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/universe-nothing/)

videos.title: Is There Evidence That Dinosaurs Lived Recently?
videos.description:
Textbooks and even children’s books tout dinosaur history going back millions of years. The Bible presents a different account of only thousands of years. Can fossils help us discern between these two different interpretations?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/dinosaurs-lived-recently/)

videos.title: Did Dinosaurs Evolve into Birds?
videos.description:
“Birds are living dinosaurs.” Can we trust the bold narratives of museum displays and textbooks? Evolutionary scientists investigate this subject and are still divided on the matter. What is the truth? Brian shares three clear reasons why birds did not evolve from reptiles.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/dinosaurs-evolve-birds/)

videos.title: Were Dinosaurs Designed?
videos.description:
Could God have created dinosaurs? Biochemist Brian Thomas was taught that dinosaurs evolved over millions of years via natural processes and death. Which dinosaur origin model is true? What do the fossils reveal?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/dinosaurs-designed/)

videos.title: Are Dinosaurs in the Bible?
videos.description:
The Bible mentions several extinct reptiles. Biblical authors described their anatomy, lifestyles, and even habitats. Is it possible that these vanished creatures were dinosaurs?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/dinosaurs-in-bible/)

videos.title: Are Human Fossils Buried with Dinosaur Fossils?
videos.description:
Creation scientists say dinosaurs and man co-existed. The Bible also teaches this as historical fact. Should we find human and dinosaur fossils together in the same rock layers?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/human-dinosaur-fossils/)

videos.title: Catastrophic Plate Tectonics and the Ice Age
videos.description:
Flood secrets long buried reveal fascinating confirmation for the Genesis account. Where did the water come from to Flood the entire earth? Did the plates move rapidly and break apart during the Flood? Was there really a Pangea? Where did all of the water go post-Flood? And why was there an ice age?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/plate-tectonics-ice-age/)

videos.title: Oil as a "Soft Tissue"
videos.description:
Oil is in the news almost every day due to fluctuating prices and controversial fracking. How does oil fit into the Bible? Was oil made in the Flood? How does this important commodity influence a biblical worldview?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/oil-soft-tissue/)

videos.title: Dinosaur Evolution and the Fossil Record
videos.description:
Is dinosaur evolution a fable? Secularists claim that the terrible lizards evolved from ancestors. But what do the fossils show? Are they truly millions of years old? Do dinosaurs disprove the Bible?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/dinosaur-evolution/)

videos.title: Summary of Megasequences across Africa and the Pre-Flood World
videos.description:
Dr. Clarey shifts focus from North America to Africa. How does the African continent show a similar geological story? How can we know the Flood was not merely localized around the Black Sea? And what impact does this have on the Christian faith?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/megasequences-africa/)

videos.title: Summary of Megasequences across North America and the Global Flood
videos.description:
Many wonder if the global Flood was real. Can we trust Genesis? What really happened during this worldwide, watery catastrophe? What do rock layers across North America reveal?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/megasequences-north-america/)

videos.title: Dinosaurs
videos.description:
What is the origin of dinosaurs? Can we trust the fossil record? Questions abound regarding these famous “thunder lizards.” But secular textbooks lack strong, scientific answers. Where should Christians go for solid dinosaur science?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/dinosaurs/)

videos.title: The Flood
videos.description:
Christians must build their worldview on the whole Bible. But there’s no need to throw out science. Science harmonizes well with the biblical message—right down to the details. How does the evidence lead to a recent, global Flood? Why is the evolutionary timescale false? And what does the geologic column really reveal about Earth history?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/flood/)

videos.title: War of the Worldviews
videos.description:
Everyone has a worldview. Evolutionism and Christianity are competing worldviews; Christianity and science are not. Do you know why you believe what you believe? Are you ready to defend your faith “with meekness and fear”?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/war-worldviews/)

videos.title: Bees
videos.description:
There are 20,000 known species of bees! These industrious insects possess incredible skills for creating orderly and efficient honeycombs. How are bees unique? And what can we learn about the Creator’s design from these winged workers?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/bees/)

videos.title: The Age of the Universe
videos.description:
Most students are taught that the universe is 13.8 billion years old. But the Bible teaches a much younger age. In this episode, we’ll discuss the many lines of evidence confirming that the universe is, in fact, only thousands of years old.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/age-universe/)

videos.title: Astronomy: The Bible Got It Right!
videos.description:
Does astronomy disprove the Bible like many scoffers claim? Actually, history confirms that the Bible is always right when it touches on any subject—including astronomy. Learn how the Bible got astronomy right when it addresses the roundness of Earth, its suspension in space, the expansion of the heavens, and more!
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/astronomy-bible-right/)

videos.title: The Timescale of Creation
videos.description:
Many claim that science proves the Earth is billions of years old. But Genesis chapter one teaches that God created the universe and everything in it in only six days. How long ago did God create the universe and how long did He take to do it? Does this issue really matter?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/timescale-of-creation/)

videos.title: Your Origins Matter
videos.description:
Is Genesis just a myth made up by primitive people? Is it merely an allegory containing spiritual truths? Or does this book reveal a historical record of how God literally created the universe? Every Christian should believe in a literal Genesis and stand ready to defend biblical creation.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/your-origins-matter/)

videos.title: The Mystery of Wooly Mammoths
videos.description:
Millions of wooly mammoths once lived around the world, particularly in extremely cold places. These elephantine creatures present a major mystery for secular scientists. Why is that? How could wooly mammoths survive the frigid climate of an ice age? And where would they find a sufficient food supply?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/wooly-mammoths/)

videos.title: Biology and the Age of the Earth
videos.description:
Many Christians compromise the creation account in order to accommodate Scripture with secular science. But an old earth means death really isn’t the penalty for sin. What does the Bible say about the age of the earth? And how young is the earth from a life science perspective?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/biology-earth-age/)

videos.title: Logical Fallacies
videos.description:
Logic is the study of the principles of correct reasoning. It can teach us to think properly and construct rational arguments—valuable skills for defending the Christian faith. Christians should learn how to spot logical fallacies when conversing with people who challenge their beliefs.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/logical-fallacies/)

videos.title: Genesis and Climate Change
videos.description:
Climate change is a hot topic in the news today. Many people—including some Christians—have been concerned that the amount of atmospheric carbon dioxide could have an adverse effect on climate. Should we be worried about climate change (or global warming)? Is this a moral issue requiring legal action? What should Christians think?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/climate-change/)

videos.title: Do Deep Ice Cores Prove an Old Earth?
videos.description:
Secular scientists have drilled into the thick ice sheets of Greenland and Antarctica and extracted cores that run thousands of meters deep. These scientists claim that the deepest layers are hundreds of thousands of years old. Do these ice cores really prove an old earth?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/ice-cores/)

videos.title: The Ice Age
videos.description:
Many Christians wonder about the ice age. Was there an ice age in earth history? If so, how many were there? And how would such a dramatic climate change fit into biblical history?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/ice-age/)

videos.title: Hiding from God in the Multiverse
videos.description:
A number of secular cosmologists claim that our universe is just one of many universes that exist. Why do they say this? Is there any evidence for this claim? And how does this relate to the creation-evolution controversy?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/multiverse/)

videos.title: Day Six…Man as God’s Steward
videos.description:
At the end of God’s creative activities, He surveyed His work and pronounced it “very good.” Genesis 2 (/bible/Genesis/2)  describes how God prepared a special garden in which the man and the woman would begin their stewardship duties. Why did God finish the creation week with a day of rest? What should our relationship with the Owner of all things look like? Discover how the Creator God of the Bible is our source for life and our only means of redemption.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/day-six-steward/)

videos.title: Day Six…Made in God’s Image
videos.description:
What does it mean that God “created” in His own “image”? Theologians and students of Scripture have been pondering this concept for millennia. What hints can we find in the Bible? And what does Genesis tell us about man’s unique responsibility as bearers of God’s image?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/day-six-image/)

videos.title: Day Six…Cattle, Beasts of the Earth, and Creeping Things
videos.description:
On Day Six, God focused on creating land creatures. He evidently created these vast “kinds” in direct proportion to how they would relate to humans. What distinguishes birds from cattle? How many species represent “creeping things”? And how can we know that Behemoth was a dinosaur?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/day-six/)

videos.title: Day Five…Soaring Birds to Scary Pterodactyls
videos.description:
God was busy on Day Five. Not only did He create water creatures, He also dedicated this day to “the birds of the air.” What Genesis-confirming design details can we observe in the anatomy of flying creatures? Are feathers unique to birds? And how has man applied birdwatching observations to modern technology?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/day-five-birds/)

videos.title: Day Five…Sea Cucumbers to Sea Monsters
videos.description:
Did you know that oceans cover 70% of the Earth’s surface? The first life God created lived in water, and much of what we call life dwells in the oceans, lakes, and rivers of our planet. What can we learn about different types of skin and scales? And what kind of creature was Leviathan?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/day-five/)

videos.title: Day Four…Sun, Moon, and Stars
videos.description:
Once the planet had been properly prepared, the earth was ready for its clocks. There must be a time-keeping system for “signs and seasons, and for days and years.” What did God originally say about the purpose of the heavenly lights? And why were the events on the fourth day significant?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/day-four/)

videos.title: Day Three…Plants and "Kinds"
videos.description:
One of the more prevalent theories today is that biological systems developed over long ages by natural processes. But the Bible seems to lump all of plant science into one day’s event. How could that be? Are plants “alive” in the biblical sense? And what exactly is a “kind”?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/day-three-plants/)

videos.title: Day Three…Land and Seas
videos.description:
Day Three began with organizational processes acting on the rotating sphere that had been set in motion on the first day and divided into separate “waters” on the second day. What does it mean that God gathered the “seas” into “one place?” What scientific insight can help us understand the primeval shaping of Earth’s elements?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/day-three/)

videos.title: Day Two…The Firmament
videos.description:
On Day Two of creation, the triune Godhead began “making” and “shaping” the heavens and the earth into an organized and functioning cosmos. He was preparing it to support the life that would be created on Days Five and Six. What exactly were “the firmament” and “the waters above”? How was Earth different from what we experience today?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/day-two/)

videos.title: Introduction and Day One…The Tri-Universe
videos.description:
Genesis 1 says that God created the universe and all it contains in six 24-hour days. This account is not difficult to understand. Its grammatical structure clearly falls within the narrative genre; in other words, it is a historical account. How can Hebrew vocabulary and the doctrine of the Trinity confirm a literal interpretation of the creation week?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/day-one/)

videos.title: God's Marvelous Insects
videos.description:
Did you know that the moth smells with its antennae? Whether we look at moths, ants, bombardier beetles, dragon fly eyes, or even the brains of bees, the wonders of God’s design in the insect world are “clearly seen.”
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/marvelous-insects/)

videos.title: The Myth of Human Evolution
videos.description:
Have you ever wondered if your appendix, wisdom teeth, and tonsils were useless structures due to human evolution over millions of years? Find out whether the fossil record supports human evolution or the special creation of man in the beginning.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/myth-human-evolution/)

videos.title: The Mighty Oceans
videos.description:
It’s hard to ignore the oceans when they cover a vast majority of the planet. But did you know that evolution theory does not explain the origin of the oceans or the trillions of creatures that live in them?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/mighty-oceans/)

videos.title: The Flood of Fossils
videos.description:
Fossils are featured in national parks, textbooks, and museums around the world. Were they formed over millions of years of evolution? Or are they a record of God’s judgment through a global Flood?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/flood-of-fossils/)

videos.title: Marvelous Molecular Machines
videos.description:
We’ve seen in museums, textbooks, magazines, and in our biology classes that all life is made up of cells. Inside these cells are tiny, submicroscopic, molecular machines that function to sustain life. How do these biological machines work? And what does the Bible have to say about design in nature?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/molecular-machines/)

videos.title: God’s Character Absolutely Forbids Evolutionary Methods
videos.description:
God’s holiness demands that His creation should not distort anything about Him or about the creation itself. God could not create processes that would counter His own nature or that would lead man to conclude something untrue about God. If the words of Scripture are true words, if they are God’s words, then there can be no “evolution” in God’s work.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/god-character-forbids-evolution/)

videos.title: There Is No Evidence Evolution Took Place in the Past
videos.description:
Historical science observes clues in the present that may be applied to a possible cause in the past. Evolutionists claim that fish evolved into amphibians, and amphibians into reptiles, and so on. But what do we see in the fossil record? Do evolutionists hold a worldview supported by true science?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/no-evidence-evolution-past/)

videos.title: Science Does Not Observe Evolution Happening Today
videos.description:
Science is based on observation and experimentation. Have scientists ever observed a beneficial mutation? Although many experiments have attempted to duplicate some form of evolutionary change, no one has ever come close to “evolving” anything in the laboratory.
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/science-not-observe-evolution/)

videos.title: The Bible Does Not Allow an Evolutionary Interpretation
videos.description:
The Bible is very precise in its language about the timescale of creation. The very concept of our “day” is defined in the first chapter of Genesis. So, is it possible to translate the word “day” to mean “age” to accommodate the required eons of evolution? And does the biblical record have any compatibility with the story of evolution?
 More... (https://www.icr.org/article/bible-not-evolutionary-interpretation/)

videos.title: Five Reasons to Believe in Recent Creation (Intro)
videos.description:
Did you know there isn’t a hint of long evolutionary ages in the Bible? Still, some insist that God used evolution to create living organisms—including us. Can Christians believe in both creation and evolution?

videos.title: Unearthing a Duckbilled Dinosaur? | Dinosaur Week at the ICR Discovery Center | March 12, 2024
videos.description:
Dinosaurs have fascinated us for centuries. Some scientists claim that these creatures lived long before humans, millions of years in the past. But such assertions oppose the historical account of Scripture. Which is true? Find out during Dinosaur Week 2024 at the ICR Discovery Center—March 12–16!

—

Tuesday, March 12

• 10:30 AM | “Raising Ruth, Unearthing a Duckbilled Dinosaur in the Hell Creek Formation” by Tommy Lohman of Glendive Dinosaur & Fossil Museum

Have you ever wanted to get a glimpse into the work of excavating a dinosaur skeleton? How do they excavate those delicate bones? Come and hear Field Paleontologist Tommy Lohman (Glendive Dinosaur and Fossil Museum, Montana) explain the excavation process and provide relevant insights into the Genesis flood and how it affirms history as recorded in the Bible.

• 1:00 PM | "Discovering Dinosaurs" by Dr. Brian Thomas of ICR

Dr. Thomas presents five details about dinosaurs that reframe the biggest dinosaur questions, including how dinosaurs got here and where they went.

* All livestream times are Central Daylight Time.

—

videos.description:
Dinosaurs have fascinated us for centuries. Some scientists claim that these creatures lived long before humans, millions of years in the past. But such assertions oppose the historical account of Scripture. Which is true? Find out during Dinosaur Week 2024 at the ICR Discovery Center—March 12–16!

—

Wednesday, March 13

• 10:30 AM | “Beholding Behemoth, the Bible, and Science Behind the Chief of Dinosaurs” by Tommy Lohman of Glendive Dinosaur & Fossil Museum

Are dinosaurs mentioned in the Bible? The book of Job talks about an animal called 'Behemoth,' described as the 'chief of the ways of God.' Join us and learn from Field Paleontologist Tommy Lohman about how Behemoth is a dinosaur and how the details of Job 40 help us understand dinosaur biomechanics.

• 1:00 PM | "Do Dinosaurs Support Evolution?" by Dr. Tim Clarey of ICR

Dr. Clarey talks about the fossil record of dinosaurs, showing they appeared suddenly and without ancestors. He also explains how dinosaurs and birds are not alike, and how dinosaurs did not have feathers. Finally, he addresses the asteroid extinction story and counters with a Biblical explanation of the disappearance of dinosaurs.

* All livestream times are Central Daylight Time.

No scientific evidence that Homo naledi buried their dead and produced rock art - https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/abs/pii/S0047248423001434

videos.title: When Day Meets Night: Solar Eclipse Totality at the ICR Discovery Center
videos.description:
The skies cleared above North Texas on Monday, April 8, for a spectacular view of the 2024 Great American Solar Eclipse. Hundreds of guests joined the Institute for Creation Research to witness this incredible sight at First Baptist Church Forney and the ICR Discovery Center in Dallas, with several others from around the world viewing via ICR’s YouTube livestream. While totality only lasted about four minutes, the day was filled with celebration alongside ICR scientists, Apollo 16 astronaut Gen. Charlie Duke and his wife, Dotty, NASA astronaut Col. Jeff Williams, former NASA engineer Cathryn Sterling, and several astronomy enthusiasts.

Read the full story here: https://www.icr.org/article/when-day-meets-night-total-success

Totality image and video credit: Parker Eng, Day4 Astronomy, https://day4.org/

videos.title: Ernst Haeckel: Evolutionary Huckster
videos.description:
Ernst Haeckel, a German Zoologist, is famous for developing a series of images of embryos in development called Anthropogenie. These images, supposedly proof of evolution, dominated culture and textbooks for some time.

But Haeckel was wrong, and the damage he caused has never quite been undone. What happened?

Host Trey and Dr. Randy Guliuzza discuss this vital topic on episode 71 of The Creation Podcast!

Twenty Evolutionary Blunders:
https://store.icr.org/dr-randy-guliuzza-twenty-evolutionary-blunders.html

videos.title: ICR Dinosaur Dig Experience in Glendive, Montana!
videos.description:
Do you dream of unearthing a bone from a Triceratops? A hadrosaur? A T. rex? Have you ever wondered what it feels like to hold a freshly dug dinosaur fossil in your hands, or to see other animals buried along with dinosaurs, providing evidence for the global flood? Now is your time to make this dream a reality!

We are excited to announce our first ever Dinosaur Dig Experience! This year, we will be digging in the fossil-rich landscapes of Glendive, Montana. We invite you to roll up your sleeves with us, grab a digging tool, and uncover the mysterious creatures that lie within the sediment layers of this barren land.

This dino dig isn’t just about digging. It’s about learning, exploring, and examining the evidence that demonstrates a catastrophic global flood. You’ll have the unique opportunity to learn from ICR Research Scientist Dr. Brian Thomas, Field Paleontologist Mr. Tommy Lohman, and Glendive Dinosaur and Fossil Museum Director Mr. Robert Canen. Who knows what you will discover!

No experience? No problem! Whether you’re a seasoned fossil hunter or a curious first-timer, our experienced team will guide you every step of the way. Tools, safety equipment, and training will be provided.

Visit https://www.icr.org/dinodig to learn more.

We will also have presentations from Mr. Bruce Malone of Search for the Truth, educating us on how to defend the truth of biblical creation, and from Dr. Brian Thomas of ICR who will be speaking on how we can view this commemoration in light of the Gospel.

Along with our educational presentations, there will be a petting zoo, food trucks, fun activities, games and discounted tickets for everyone!

videos.title: Darwin vs. Mendel: A Battle of Worldviews
videos.description:
This video will be made public on August 13, 2024.

Living things, whether animal or plant, exhibit a variety of traits that can change from generation to generation. These trait variations can help them adapt to thrive in certain situations. Some of these adaptations happen quite quickly as creatures pioneer new niches, developing traits that allow them to fit their environmental conditions. But how does this happen?

Join host Trey Bowling and Dr. Brian Thomas as they discuss this topic on episode 79 of The Creation Podcast.

videos.title: Living for a Millennium?!
videos.description:
This video will be made public on August 27, 2024.

Scripture describes humans living for a very long time, nearly a millennium before the Flood. Many scoff at this, stating that this is reason to disregard the Bible. Even some evangelicals claim these ages just can’t be taken literally. But, is that really true? Are such long lifespans scientifically possible? And is there historical or scientific evidence to corroborate the Bible’s claims that ancient humans experienced extreme longevity?

Join host Renée Dusseau and Dr. Jake Hebert as they discuss this topic on episode 80 of The Creation Podcast.

videos.title: Giants, Genetics, and Pre-Flood Longevity
videos.description:
This video will be made public on September 10, 2024.

Scripture describes humans living for a very long time, nearly a millennium before the Flood. Many scoff at this, stating this is reason to disregard the Bible. Even some evangelicals claim these ages just can’t be taken literally. But, is that really true?

In the last episode, we looked at historical and scientific evidence to corroborate the Bible’s claim that the Genesis patriarchs lived to extremely old ages. In fact, this longevity was probably experienced by at least some animals, as well. In this podcast, we ask the question, Might it eventually be possible for biblical creationists to actually explain this extreme longevity?

Join host Renée Dusseau and Dr. Jake Hebert as they discuss this topic on episode 81 of The Creation Podcast.

videos.title: Biblical Archaeology Conference 2024
videos.description:
The Bible has been God’s Word to His people for millennia, but most people today question whether the events it records are actual history. Every time the Bible’s claims can be tested, however, they stand up to scrutiny. Join us on Friday, November 10th, and Saturday, November 11th, as we explore the archaeological evidence for the historicity of the Bible!

The Biblical Archaeology Conference will feature renowned Biblical Scholar and Archaeologist, Dr. Randall Price of World of the Bible, and Prof. Tom Meyer, author of Archaeology and the Bible, and a graduate of Jerusalem University College.

videos.title: Living in Light of Genesis
videos.description:
This video will be made public on September 24, 2024.

The world tells us that the book of Genesis is, if not entirely, at least partially a myth. We are told that history, archaeology, and science contradict supernatural creation and that there were no Adam and Eve in a Garden of Eden, so their sin didn’t bring death into the world.

But does the evidence support the truth of the Bible’s opening book? Could it be that Genesis is vitally important to how we understand our world, our lives, and the God who made us? Does it provide the foundation we need for all aspects of faith, science, and culture?

Dr. Thomas, author of Living in Light of Genesis, learned to accept the Bible’s history as literally truth not in spite of historical scientific knowledge, but in light of that knowledge.

Join host Renée Dusseau and Dr. Brian Thomas as they discuss this topic on episode 82 of The Creation Podcast.

Purchase Living in Light of Genesis here: https://store.icr.org/living-in-light-of-genesis.html

videos.description:
This video will be made public on October 8, 2024.

Racism and its foul fruits have plagued humanity for thousands of years and in the past couple of centuries it seems to have only reared its ugly head all the more. There are some that claim that the Bible promotes permanent racial divisions and is therefore either the cause or a major driving force behind modern racial hatreds. But is this true? videos.title: These Ph.D. Scientists Believe the Bible!
videos.description:
Dr. Brian Thomas interviews Dr. Stephen Taylor and his wife, Ann, to explore how their deep-rooted faith and advanced scientific research intersect. Dr. Taylor, a mass spectrometry expert, shares his journey from skepticism to belief in biblical creation, revealing how his technical research—spanning dinosaurs, dating methods, and paleobiochemistry—strengthened his conviction in the Bible’s reliability. Together, they discuss reconciling science and Scripture, showing how scientific evidence harmonizes with biblical truth. This insightful conversation will encourage you to consider a fresh perspective on origins, purpose, and faith. Discover how cutting-edge science supports a biblical worldview in this engaging interview!

videos.title: The Undeniable Power of Narrative
videos.description:
This video will be made public on November 5, 2024.

Science is objective. At least, that’s what we’re told. But there are inherent issues with this statement that can cause very real confusion. How can two rational, intelligent people look at the same piece of evidence and offer different explanations for their observations—and not just different, but mutually exclusive. What causes this divide, and what can we do about it?

Join host Renée Dusseau and Dr. Randy Guliuzza as they discuss this topic on episode 85 of The Creation Podcast.

videos.title: A Theory Designed to Be...Anti-Design
videos.description:
This video will be made public on November 19, 2024.

Science is objective. At least, that’s what we’re told. But there are inherent issues with this statement that can cause very real confusion. How can two rational, intelligent people look at the same piece of evidence and offer different explanations for their observations—and not just different, but mutually exclusive. What causes this divide, and what can we do about it?

In the previous episode, we looked at the purpose and power of theory. Now we’ll look at how evolutionary selectionism, the current reigning theory, is purposefully crafted to be anti-design, and therefore remove any sort of Designer from the equation.

Join host Renée Dusseau and Dr. Randy Guliuzza as they discuss this topic on episode 86 of The Creation Podcast.

videos.title: Megasequences of the Great Flood Trailer | Creation Class
videos.description:
Earth's sedimentary rocks are made of six layers—or megasequences—laid one on top of the other in the same pattern all over the world. Many geologists claim these layers were laid down slowly over vast spans of time, but where is the evidence? What do the rocks actually show? Join ICR geologist Dr. Timothy Clarey as he digs through the rock record and explores Earth's megasequences to uncover the truth.

Can science and faith be reconciled? What should we believe about the Bible's account of human origins and Earth history? ICR's Creation Class series affirms the accuracy and reliability of Scripture.

Join ICR experts as they teach how science—from genetics to geology—confirms the truth of God's Word.

Champions of Creation can watch here: https://youtu.be/tdvus1iFRPs

videos.title: From the Beginning to the End
videos.description:
Genesis and Revelation provide stunning bookends of the biblical canon. The first describes the beginning of creation while the second gives us insight into future eternity. Both are vital pieces of Scripture and yet, without fail, they are two of the most highly questioned books of the Bible. Are these accounts true? Can they be trusted? What purpose do they have in the Christian's life?

Hosts Trey and Michael are joined by Col. Tim Moore and Dr. Randy Guliuzza to discuss this topic in episode 31 of Creation.Live.

Science is objective. At least, that’s what we’re told. But there are inherent issues with this statement that can cause very real confusion. How can two rational, intelligent people look at the same piece of evidence and offer different explanations for their observations—and not just different, but mutually exclusive. What causes this divide, and what can we do about it?

In the previous episodes, we looked at the purpose and power of theory, and how evolutionary selectionism, the current reigning theory, is purposefully crafted to be anti-design. In this episode, we’ll look at how to reverse Darwin’s thought processes to develop a theory of biological design that actually works.

Join host Renée Dusseau and Dr. Randy Guliuzza as they discuss this topic on episode 87 of The Creation Podcast.

videos.title: Foundations of Astronomy Trailer | Kids on Mission
videos.description:
The heavens declare the glory of God! In Foundations of Astronomy, explore the wonders of stars, planets, galaxies, and our solar system through a biblical lens (Psalm 19:1). Learn what these celestial bodies reveal about our Creator and study the work of astronomers and astronauts who explored the skies before us.

Conduct hands-on experiments, observe the night sky, and follow in the footsteps of great scientists as you earn your Foundations of Astronomy patch. Get ready for a journey beyond our world—this mission is going to be a blast!

What is Kids on Mission?
A science-focused, gospel-driven program for K-6th graders. Through hands-on challenges, experiments, and digital learning tools, kids explore scientific principles through a biblical worldview.

Why join?

- Learn science through engaging challenges
- Earn mission patches for completed challenges
- Strengthen your faith and share the truth of God’s creation

Start your journey today. Learn more and register here: https://www.icr.org/kids-on-mission

videos.title: 3 Game-Changing Benefits of a Theory of Biological Design
videos.description:
This video will be made public on December 17, 2024.

Dr. Guliuzza's articles on this topic:
Why Biology Needs a Theory of Biological Design
Part 1 - https://www.icr.org/article/why-biology-needs-theory-biological
Part 2 - https://www.icr.org/article/why-biology-needs-theory-biological-2
Part 3 - https://www.icr.org/article/why-biology-needs-theory-biological-3
Part 4 - https://www.icr.org/article/why-biology-needs-theory-biological-4

Science is objective. At least, that’s what we’re told. But there are inherent issues with this statement that can cause very real confusion. How can two rational, intelligent people look at the same piece of evidence and offer different explanations for their observations—and not just different, but mutually exclusive. What causes this divide, and what can we do about it?

In the previous episodes, we looked at the purpose and power of theory; how evolutionary selectionism, the current reigning theory, is purposefully crafted to be anti-design; and how to reverse Darwin’s thought processes to develop a theory of biological design that actually works. In this episode, we’ll look at how the benefits of a theory of biological design as well as a general overview of what it means to look at organisms with such a perspective.

Join host Renée Dusseau and Dr. Randy Guliuzza as they discuss this topic on episode 88 of The Creation Podcast.

videos.title: Made In His Image Seminar 2025
videos.description:
Join us LIVE on January 18, 2025, to celebrate the sanctity of human life during ICR's annual Made in His Image Seminar at the ICR Discovery Center. https://www.youtube.com/live/9Yv4m9FYy2I?si=9XEQXl8j6MvoL4b6

What determines the value of human life? How do we measure its worth, and what steps can we take to protect and cherish it? These profound questions are at the heart of ongoing debates in today’s culture, where ideas about the meaning and value of life are often challenged. To find true and lasting answers, we must look to the Creator of life, the ultimate source of purpose and design, for a correct understanding of what it means to be human and why life is sacred.

ICR president Dr. Randy Guliuzza will delve into the extraordinary design behind human life, highlighting the intricate complexity and purpose that reflect the work of an intelligent Creator. His insights will offer a fresh perspective on why human life is not only unique but also precious beyond measure. Additionally, Mr. Jay Seegert, founder of The Starting Point Project, will equip attendees with practical tools to defend the value of life in a culture often at odds with its sacredness. His dynamic presentation will empower individuals to confidently articulate the reasons why every human life is worth protecting and honoring.

This seminar will be an enlightening experience, combining science, faith, and apologetics to deepen our appreciation for the Creator's handiwork and strengthen our ability to advocate for the sanctity of life in our communities and beyond. Join us for this inspiring event and take part in celebrating the wonder and value of human life.

videos.title: America's Oldest National Park - Exploring the Unique Features of Yellowstone
videos.description:
This video will be made public on January 14, 2025.

Carved in Stone - https://store.icr.org/carved-in-stone.html
Carved in Stone (DVD) - https://store.icr.org/carved-in-stone-dvd.html
Creation on Location - https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwhfxndgaHD8MDfIU9MHBbi_x1f1stCAa
Parks Across America - https://store.icr.org/parks-across-america.html
Parks Across America Map - https://store.icr.org/parks-across-america-map.html
Bundle - https://store.icr.org/parks-across-america-pack.html

America is home to stunning forests, mountains, monuments, and other wondrous features. The unique beauty of many of these locations has prompted both state and federal governments to designate them as national or state parks. Thousands upon thousands of visitors visit these sites daily to experience their awe-inspiring grandeur. But where did they come from? Many scientists claim that most of them formed slowly through uniformitarian processes, but is that true? Join us as we journey through the Parks Across America.

In this first episode of the series, we’re going to take a look at some of the features of America’s oldest national park—Yellowstone.

Join host Trey Bowling and Dr. Timothy Clarey as they discuss this topic on episode 89 of The Creation Podcast.

videos.description:
This video will be made public on January 28, 2025.

America is home to stunning forests, mountains, monuments, and other wondrous features. The unique beauty of many of these locations has prompted both state and federal governments to designate them as national or state parks. Thousands upon thousands of visitors visit these sites daily to experience their awe-inspiring grandeur. But where did they come from? Many scientists claim that most of them formed slowly through uniformitarian processes, but is that true? Join us as we journey through the Parks Across America.

In this second episode of the series, we’re going to take a look at several national monuments throughout the United States.

Join host Trey Bowling and Dr. Timothy Clarey as they discuss this topic on episode 90 of The Creation Podcast.

videos.title: The Great Ape Debate: Bad Science Gone Bananas? | Creation Connection Ep. 1
videos.description:
The chimpanzee: our distant relative or just a funky neighbor? Humans and chimps are often compared, with claims of a 98-99% DNA match. But is this legitimate science or a case of cherry-picked data?

Join us for episode one of Creation Connection as we dive into what genetics really say about chimps, humans, and our origins. Evolutionists have their theories, but do they hold up under scrutiny? Spoiler alert: the truth might surprise you.

With insights from geneticist Dr. Jeff Tomkins and a closer look at what the Bible says, we’ll untangle the facts, bust myths, and maybe even settle the ultimate question. Where did humans come from?

Settle back, grab some takeout (optional), and don’t forget to like, subscribe, and ring the bell!

videos.title: Earth: A Cosmic Coincidence or Perfect Design? | Creation Connection Ep. 2
videos.description:
Earth races around the sun at 67,000 miles per hour, yet it remains the only known planet to support life. Why does our world have the perfect conditions for oceans, seasons, and breathable air, while thousands of others remain barren and lifeless? Is this just a cosmic fluke, or is there something special about our home?

Join us for episode two of Creation Connection as we explore why Earth’s position in the ‘Goldilocks Zone’ makes it the ultimate home—neither scorched nor frozen, but perfectly suited for life. From its precise orbit to the stabilizing role of the moon and protective atmosphere, everything about our planet appears fine-tuned for our survival. Could it really be an accident, or is it the work of a masterful Creator?

With insights from physicist Dr. Jake Hebert and a closer look at what the Bible says, we’ll uncover the science behind our planet’s perfect placement and what it reveals about its origins. When you examine the details, Earth seems less like a lucky break and more like a work of genius.

Pour yourself a bowl of porridge (optional), and don’t forget to like, subscribe, and ring the bell!

Watch the whole series here: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwhfxndgaHD90YdvAqJ2Mxq1-2AXXqH0R&si=ywE2bBvShne4haqD

America is home to stunning forests, mountains, monuments, and other wondrous features. The unique beauty of many of these locations has prompted both state and federal governments to designate them as national or state parks. Many scientists claim that most of them formed slowly through uniformitarian processes, but is that true? Join us as we journey through Parks Across America.

In the first couple of episodes of this series, we explored America’s oldest national park—Yellowstone—as well as several prominent national monuments. Today, we’ll be visiting two other national parks, both of which show signs of catastrophic flood activity.

videos.title: Exploring the Deep: Ocean Oddities That Defy Evolution | Creation Connection Ep. 3
videos.description:
The ocean covers over 70% of our planet, yet more than 90% of its depths remain unexplored. And lurking beneath the waves? Some of the strangest, most fascinating creatures you’ll ever see! But are these bizarre marine invertebrates the product of random evolution, or do they showcase masterful design?

Join us for episode three of Creation Connection as we dive into the incredible world of jellyfish, octopuses, nautiluses, and other spineless wonders. With their mind-blowing abilities—like built-in jet propulsion, invisibility cloaks, and even stolen stinging cells—these creatures seem anything but accidental.

Biologist Dr. Frank Sherwin joins us as we take a closer look at what the Bible says and uncover the truth behind these underwater wonders. We’ll explore the ocean’s oddest animals and what they reveal about their origins. Could these deep-sea creatures really be the result of chance, or do they point to a brilliant Creator?

Strap on your snorkel (optional), and don’t forget to like, subscribe, and ring the bell!

videos.title: Foundations of Botany Trailer | Kids on Mission
videos.description:
Discover the beauty and design of Kingdom Plantae in this new Foundations of Botany course. Learn about plant types, classification, and the cellular processes that help them thrive. Explore ecology, mutualism, and how weather and seasons impact plant growth. Get hands-on by starting your own garden and learning plant care and propagation.

Botany is deeply rooted in Scripture. We’ll examine what plants teach us about creation, ourselves, and our Savior (Isaiah 40:8).

What is Kids on Mission?
A science-focused, gospel-driven program for K-6th graders. Through hands-on challenges, experiments, and digital learning tools, kids explore scientific principles through a biblical worldview.

Why join?

- Learn science through engaging challenges
- Earn mission patches for completed challenges
- Strengthen your faith and share the truth of God’s creation

videos.title: Dragon Encounters: Exploring Myths, Legends, and Real History | Creation Connection Ep. 4
videos.description:
Dragons have captivated human imagination for millennia. From the mighty Bahamut of Middle Eastern lore to the fearsome Tiamat of Babylonian myth, these legendary beasts span continents and cultures. But could there be more to these stories than mere fantasy?

In this episode of Creation Connection, we journey through history’s dragon tales—from the ancient Chinese Zodiac to the pages of the Book of Job. We’ll explore Roman accounts from Alexander the Great’s campaign and uncover Marco Polo’s chilling reports of monstrous serpents in the East.

Dr. Brian Thomas joins us to examine the mysterious behemoth described in Scripture—could it be a dinosaur? And if ancient cultures worldwide spoke of dragon-like creatures, could they have encountered real animals we now call dinosaurs?

Grab your sword and shield (optional), and don’t forget to like, subscribe, and ring the bell!

Watch the whole series here: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwhfxndgaHD90YdvAqJ2Mxq1-2AXXqH0R&si=ywE2bBvShne4haqD

videos.title: Grand Tetons and Great Sand Dunes – Remnants of a Global Flood
videos.description:
This video will be made public on February 25, 2025.

Carved in Stone - https://store.icr.org/carved-in-stone.html
Carved in Stone (DVD) - https://store.icr.org/carved-in-stone-dvd.html
Creation on Location - https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwhfxndgaHD8MDfIU9MHBbi_x1f1stCAa
Parks Across America - https://store.icr.org/parks-across-america.html
Parks Across America Map - https://store.icr.org/parks-across-america-map.html
Bundle - https://store.icr.org/parks-across-america-pack.html
Megasequences of the Great Flood - https://store.icr.org/megasequences-of-the-great-flood.html

America is home to stunning forests, mountains, monuments, and other wondrous features. The unique beauty of many of these locations has prompted both state and federal governments to designate them as national or state parks. Thousands upon thousands of visitors visit these sites daily to experience their awe-inspiring grandeur. But where did they come from? Many scientists claim that most of them formed slowly through uniformitarian processes, but is that true? Join us as we journey through Parks Across America.

In the first few episodes of this series, we explored America’s oldest national park – Yellowstone, as well as several other national parks and monuments. Today we’ll be visiting two other stunning locations that showcase catastrophic geology.

Join host Trey Bowling and Dr. Timothy Clarey as they discuss this topic on episode 92 of The Creation Podcast.

Other episodes in this series:
America's Oldest National Park - Exploring the Unique Features of Yellowstone - https://youtu.be/_HG_DdEvme0
Towers, Buttes, and Gardens of Stone - Exploring America's National Monuments - https://youtu.be/84ru2qqNaKM

videos.title: Darwin's Dilemma: The Flaws of Natural Selection | Creation Connection Ep. 5
videos.description:
When Charles Darwin introduced natural selection, it became the foundation of modern evolutionary theory. But does it truly explain the complexity of life—or is it just a convenient replacement for divine design?

In this episode of Creation Connection, we dive deep into the idea of natural selection, exploring its scientific weaknesses, the language used to describe it, and why even some evolutionary scientists are questioning its validity. Is nature really an agent of change, or is there a better explanation for the way creatures adapt?

Join us as we explore Continuous Environmental Tracking (CET)—a groundbreaking model that aligns with both science and Scripture, showing how creatures are designed to adapt from within.

Featuring insights from experts, thought-provoking evidence, and a fresh look at Darwin’s own words, this episode challenges the conventional narrative on evolution.

Don’t forget to like, subscribe, and hit the bell so you never miss an episode!

Watch the whole series here: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwhfxndgaHD90YdvAqJ2Mxq1-2AXXqH0R&si=ywE2bBvShne4haqD

videos.title: The Cambrian Explosion: Evolution’s Other “Big Bang” Problem | Creation Connection Ep. 6
videos.description:
Fossils offer a fascinating glimpse into Earth’s past—but what if they tell a different story than what we’ve been taught? Evolutionists claim that the fossil record reveals a slow progression from simple to complex life. But one of the earliest layers, the Cambrian, presents a major problem: a sudden explosion of fully-formed, complex creatures with no clear evolutionary ancestors.

In this episode of Creation Connection, we dive into the mystery of the Cambrian Explosion. Why do we see clams, trilobites, and starfish appearing all at once in the fossil record? Where are the transitional forms Darwin himself admitted were missing? And why do so many Cambrian creatures still look the same today?

Dr. Timothy Clarey joins us as we explore how the Cambrian Explosion challenges the core tenets of evolution and how the global flood provides a better explanation for the evidence.

Learn why evolutionists have been struggling with this problem for over a century, and don’t forget to like, subscribe, and ring the bell!

Watch the whole series here: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwhfxndgaHD90YdvAqJ2Mxq1-2AXXqH0R&si=ywE2bBvShne4haqD

videos.title: Cold Hard Facts: Ice Cores and the Collapse of Old Earth Creationism
videos.description:
This video will be made public on March 11, 2025.

Welcome to the first episode in a series called “The Failures of Old Earth Creationism.” Many Christians attempt to fit old earth ideology into their beliefs, adopting uniformitarian or evolutionary pieces into their worldview. While this is often done in an effort to appeal to science, it often leads to major issues logically, scientifically, and theologically.

Today we’ll look at what is considered by many to be a strong argument for an old Earth: ice cores. Ice cores, cylindrical cores drilled from the thick ice sheets, are often presented as indisputable evidence of hundreds of thousands, or even millions, of years of Earth’s history, but how reliable are these claims? What assumptions lie beneath the surface of these interpretations? In this episode, we’ll discuss: what ice cores are and why they’re significant, the assumptions and flaws in Old Earth interpretations, and how ice cores ultimately align with a young Earth model.

Join host Trey Bowling and Dr. Jake Hebert as they discuss this topic on episode 93 of The Creation Podcast.

The debate mentioned in this podcast: https://www.youtube.com/live/ciQLb_ei4_0?si=1GnhN6jbkRG8Ypjc

The Ice Age and Climate Change: https://store.icr.org/the-ice-age-and-climate-change.html

videos.title: The ICR Dino Dig Experience 2025
videos.description:
icr.org/dinodig

Do you dream of unearthing a bone from a Triceratops? A hadrosaur? A T. rex? Have you ever wondered what it feels like to hold a freshly dug dinosaur fossil in your hands, or to see other animals buried along with dinosaurs, providing evidence for the global flood? Now is your time to make this dream a reality!

We are excited to announce our second Dinosaur Dig Experience! This year, we will be digging in the fossil-rich landscapes of Glendive, Montana. We invite you to roll up your sleeves with us, grab a digging tool, and uncover the mysterious creatures that lie within the sediment layers of this barren land.

This dino dig isn’t just about digging. It’s about learning, exploring, and examining the evidence that demonstrates a catastrophic global flood. You’ll have the unique opportunity to learn from ICR's Director of Research Dr. Tim Clarey, Field Paleontologist Mr. Tommy Lohman, and Glendive Dinosaur and Fossil Museum Director Mr. Robert Canen. Who knows what you will discover!

No experience? No problem! Whether you’re a seasoned fossil hunter or a curious first-timer, our experienced team will guide you every step of the way. Tools, safety equipment, and training will be provided.

videos.title: The Ice Age: Serious Science or Slippery Slope? | Creation Connection Ep. 7
videos.description:
The Ice Age—fact, fiction, or just really cold speculation? We’ve all seen the images: mammoths, saber-toothed cats, and glaciers covering massive parts of the earth. But how much do we really know about the Ice Age, and does the popular narrative hold up under scrutiny?

In this episode of Creation Connection, we take a cold plunge into the science behind Ice Age theories, from the widely accepted Milankovitch cycles to an alternative model grounded in the biblical record. Uniformitarian scientists propose multiple Ice Ages stretching over millions of years, but does the evidence actually support that claim? Or is there a better explanation—one that fits within a young earth framework?

Join us as we break the ice on this fascinating topic with insights from physicist Dr. Jake Hebert, who presents the H.E.A.T. model—a biblically consistent explanation of the Ice Age following the Genesis Flood. We’ll explore what caused the Ice Age, how long it lasted, and what it means for our understanding of earth’s history.

Grab your best winter coat, and don’t forget to like, subscribe, and ring the bell for more episodes of Creation Connection!

Watch the whole series here: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwhfxndgaHD90YdvAqJ2Mxq1-2AXXqH0R&si=ywE2bBvShne4haqD

videos.title: Dinosaur Soft Tissue: Fossil Evidence That Challenges Deep Time | Creation Connection Ep. 8
videos.description:
For decades, scientists assumed that dinosaur fossils were millions of years old, with all organic material long gone. But then—an accident changed everything. Dr. Mary Schweitzer’s groundbreaking discovery of soft tissue inside a T. rex bone sent shockwaves through the scientific community. Red blood cells? Collagen? Flexible material? These things shouldn’t exist if dinosaurs died out 65+ million years ago… right?

So how did this soft tissue survive? Are mainstream scientists ignoring the evidence? And what does this mean for evolutionary theory?

Some scientists scrambled for explanations, but none of them hold up under scrutiny. Could this be evidence that dinosaurs lived much more recently than we’ve been told? And does this discovery fit better with a biblical timeline?

Dr. Brian Thomas joins us as we explore how soft tissues found in fossils challenge mainstream thinking and what it really means for the age of dinosaurs (and other fossil creatures.)

Learn why this is such a big deal, and don’t forget to like, subscribe, and ring the bell!

Watch the whole series here: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwhfxndgaHD90YdvAqJ2Mxq1-2AXXqH0R&si=ywE2bBvShne4haqD

videos.title: The Soulless Hominid Theory: A Fatal Flaw in Old Earth Creationism
videos.description:
This video will be made public on March 25, 2025.

Welcome to the second episode in a series called “The Failures of Old Earth Creationism.” Many Christians attempt to fit old earth ideology into their beliefs, adopting uniformitarian or evolutionary pieces into their worldview. While this is often done in an effort to appeal to science, it can cause major logical, scientific, and theological issues.

The conversation surrounding human origins has always been an intriguing one. One of the most debated subjects is the nature of the beings labeled ‘hominids,’ particularly Neanderthals. Biblical Creationists firmly place Neanderthals in the ‘human’ category—descendants of Adam and Eve, thus bearing God’s image. Most evolutionary biologists today also agree with Neanderthals being mostly human, leaving their genetic mark on our DNA through interbreeding.

Some old earth creationists suggest something quite different. They claim that Neanderthals were nothing more than animals—truly bipedal animals that are able to make and use tools, paint, and bury their dead—but animals nonetheless.

Is there any truth to this idea? Were they just animals? Or were they fully human, bearing the image of God? In today’s episode, we’ll dig into “The Mystery of the Soulless Hominids,” exploring the faulty beliefs that lead some down this path, and uncovering what science and Scripture say about the matter.

Join host Trey Bowling and Dr. Brian Thomas as they discuss this topic on episode 94 of The Creation Podcast.

Contested Bones: https://store.icr.org/dr-john-sanford-contested-bones.html
